[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-map-controls](./harp-map-controls.md) &gt; [MapControls](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.md) &gt; [inertiaEnabled](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.inertiaenabled.md)

## MapControls.inertiaEnabled property

Set to `true` to enable an inertia dampening on zooming and panning. `false` cancels inertia.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inertiaEnabled: boolean;
```
